replies.txt_content:
标题: [1.10/1.10.2][Hardcore Cheater——极限模式作弊][HAYO]允许你在极限模式下开启作弊 本帖最后由 china521 于 2016-10-2 00:27 编辑 


原文介绍:英文慎入
This mod enables cheats in-game without the need to open the game to LAN. This gives you the benefit of being able to pause a single player game whilst still being able to run commands whilst you are in hardcore mode. (Yes a rather simple mod).

Here is how it works:

Install forge.Install mod.Start world in hardcore.Notice you can run commands.

Note: This only works for single player worlds. It does nothing on dedicated servers.

介绍这个MOD允许你在极限模式下开启作弊,且不需要打开局域网（主要内容就这些）

使用方法1.安装FORGE2.安装MOD3.开启极限模式4.注意你可以使用命令了

注只能在单人模式下工作，这个MOD在多人模式下不会工作

下载地址https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/hardcore-cheater/files国内云盘http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dEASnb7
